column.name: DEL_FLAG
column.remarks: 删除标记（0:未删除，1:已删除）

column.name: STATUS
column.remarks: 计划状态,与任务状态数值保持一致

column.name: DEL_FLAG
column.remarks: 删除标记（0:未删除，1:已删除）

column.name: RELEVANCE_TASK_NAME
column.remarks: 计划关联监督抽查任务名称

column.name: RELEVANCE_TASK_ID
column.remarks: 计划关联监督抽查任务id

column.name: PLAN_BEGIN_TIME
column.remarks: 开始时间（监督抽查任务的开始时间）

column.name: PLAN_END_TIME
column.remarks: 结束时间（监督抽查任务的结束时间）

setColumnRemarks.remarks: 确认状态Y:已确认，N：待确认，T：已回退
屠宰产品—屠宰记录关联码
最近一次成功数据同步发生的日期，格式YYYYMMDD

changeSet.author: helong (generated)
changeSet.createView: CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW TTS_VIEW_CPXSWQR_V2 (ID, PRODUCT_PC, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, STORE_COUNT, XSSL, FREEZE_COUNT, TZSL, LOSS, STATUS) AS SELECT S. ID, S.PRODUCT_PC, S.PRODUCT_AMOUNT, ( S.PRODUCT_AMOUNT - XS1.XSSL - NVL (T .TZSL, 0) - NVL (S.LOSS, 0) ) STORE_COUNT, XS1.XSSL XSSL, XS.XSDJSL FREEZE_COUNT, NVL (T .TZSL, 0) TZSL, S.LOSS, CASE WHEN s.status = 4 THEN '4' ELSE ( CASE WHEN ( S.PRODUCT_AMOUNT - XS1.XSSL - NVL (T .TZSL, 0) - NVL (S.LOSS, 0) ) = 0 THEN '3' WHEN ( S.PRODUCT_AMOUNT - XS1.XSSL - NVL (T .TZSL, 0) - NVL (S.LOSS, 0) ) > 0 THEN '2' WHEN S.PRODUCT_AMOUNT = ( S.PRODUCT_AMOUNT - XS1.XSSL - NVL (T .TZSL, 0) - NVL (S.LOSS, 0) ) THEN '1' END ) END STATUS FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_SCGL_V2 S INNER JOIN ( SELECT X.PRODUCT_SCGL_ID, SUM (X.SALE_AMOUNT) XSDJSL FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJJL_V2 X WHERE x.confirm_state = 'N' AND x.is_circulates_end = 'N' AND X.DEL_FLAG = 'N' GROUP BY PRODUCT_SCGL_ID ) XS ON XS.PRODUCT_SCGL_ID = S.PRODUCT_PC INNER JOIN ( SELECT X1.PRODUCT_SCGL_ID, SUM (X1.SALE_AMOUNT) XSSL FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJJL_V2 X1 WHERE X1.DEL_FLAG = 'N' GROUP BY PRODUCT_SCGL_ID ) XS1 ON XS1.PRODUCT_SCGL_ID = S.PRODUCT_PC LEFT JOIN ( SELECT R.PRODUCT_PC, SUM (R.SLAUGHTER_AMOUNT) TZSL FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_SLA_RECORD_V2 R WHERE R.DEL_FLAG = 'N' GROUP BY PRODUCT_PC ) T ON T .PRODUCT_PC = S.PRODUCT_PC WHERE XS.PRODUCT_SCGL_ID = XS1.PRODUCT_SCGL_ID

changeSet.author: helong (generated)
changeSet.createView: CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW TTS_VIEW_CPXS_V2 (ID, PRODUCT_PC, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, STORE_COUNT, XSSL, TZSL, LOSS, STATUS) AS SELECT S. ID, S.PRODUCT_PC, S.PRODUCT_AMOUNT, ( S.PRODUCT_AMOUNT - XS.XSSL - NVL (T .TZSL, 0) - NVL (S.LOSS, 0) ) STORE_COUNT, XS.XSSL, NVL (T .TZSL, 0) TZSL, S.LOSS, CASE WHEN s.status = 4 THEN '4' ELSE ( CASE WHEN S.PRODUCT_AMOUNT = ( XS.XSSL + NVL (T .TZSL, 0) + NVL (S.LOSS, 0) ) THEN '3' WHEN ( S.PRODUCT_AMOUNT - XS.XSSL - NVL (T .TZSL, 0) - NVL (S.LOSS, 0) ) > 0 THEN '2' WHEN S.PRODUCT_AMOUNT = S.PRODUCT_AMOUNT - XS.XSSL - NVL (T .TZSL, 0) - NVL (S.LOSS, 0) THEN '1' END ) END STATUS FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_SCGL_V2 S LEFT JOIN ( SELECT X.PRODUCT_SCGL_ID, SUM (X.SALE_AMOUNT) XSSL FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJJL_V2 X WHERE X.DEL_FLAG = 'N' GROUP BY PRODUCT_SCGL_ID ) XS ON XS.PRODUCT_SCGL_ID = S.PRODUCT_PC LEFT JOIN ( SELECT R.PRODUCT_PC, SUM (R.SLAUGHTER_AMOUNT) TZSL FROM TTS_SCLTXXCJ_SLA_RECORD_V2 R WHERE R.DEL_FLAG = 'N' GROUP BY PRODUCT_PC ) T ON T .PRODUCT_PC = S.PRODUCT_PC
